ProductInfo.Features:
GW9704H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW737V: 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Camera, Microphone, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs. OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Metal vandal proof
GW130VH: 1/3" SONY Super HAD II CCD 130 Wide Angle Dome Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.1mm Fisheye lens. OSD Menu. Highlight suppression function will block out high-bright areas, and enables better visibility of other areas
Package Includes:     GW9704H DVR with 500GB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     1 x GW737V - 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD II CCD Camera;     1 x GW130VH - 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD II CCD Camera;
1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 2CHE4 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 1 x Fisheye 130 Wide angle and 1 x build-in Microphone Security Camera, Free LED (White/Silver)
